about_the_game:
"Me and gamer girl ゲーマー女子と引きこもり" is a romantic novel game where the shut-in protagonist meets a beautiful girl at an offline gathering and gradually becomes mature throughout their dates.

A Bishojo Game released in 2022 under the "Momoiro Pocket" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.

◆Synopsis

The protagonist, Yota Asagi is a college student who became a shut-in after severe bullying from the past.

To get rid of that trauma, he dedicated his life to an MMORPG "Aku".

One day, a chat message comes from Fumaru in the same guild; "I'm being stalked, is it possible to meet you for one day?"

On the day of the meeting, being carefully prepared for and awaited, there stood "Ayumu," a girl who was much more beautiful than her avatar.

But, the story of a stalker was a lie, and she just wanted to meet with Yota.

As they went on dates, Yota gradually found himself attracted by Ayumu's bright personality.

Yota begins to make efforts to express his feelings to Ayumu, but out of the corner of his eye, he notices a suspicious shade pointing a smartphone towards them...

How will the romance quest that started with a lie end...!?

◆Characters

・Ayumu Kamura

"Isn't it a date? After all, there's only you and me."

A gamer girl who is bright as the sun. In "Aku", she is a mage with a dazzling appearance.

For some reason, she always wants to see Yota and often invites him to hang out.

She's been searching for a friend she used to play games with in the past.

・Aki Yuhi

"As a token of my gratitude, would you like me to read your fortune?"

An office lady with a cool beautiful demeanor and the ability to see spirits. In "Aku", she is a beginner player with a role of a healer.

Every time Yota feels unwell outside, she "coincidentally" happens to be there to help him.

She's skilled in fortune-telling and can also cleanse impurities.

・Yota Asagi

A college student who became a shut-in due to bullying. In "Aku", he is a rogue who seeks rare items.

Since meeting Ayumu, he starts exercising to get used to going out and begins to pay attention to his appearance.

From Ayumu and Aki, he begins to notice the kindness of those around him and gradually opens up his wounded heart.

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game contain revealing clothing and mild sexual content. Not intended for children or all ages.
